/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. The sun, positioned in the top right corner of the image, casts its bright light over the scene, creating a lens flare that adds a touch of dynamism to the otherwise static cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which accentuates the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The overall composition of the image provides a comprehensive view of the city's architectural style and urban planning.
